title: How to Make Afritada

steps.headline: Boil ½ kilo pork until soft
Cook the liver medium rare in a frying pan before boiling it together with the boiled pork.
Sauté the spices(Onion garlic, cherry tomato, laurel leaf)
Add the boiled pork, achuete extract and liver together with the sautéed spices, stir fry quickly just to combine and enhance the flavors.
Then you may now add the pork stock.
Add the tomato paste after the pork stock
Add the baby carrots last(The stock will taste disgusting when the carrots are over boiled, carrots are merely there for color)
Boil until the flavors have properly merge.
Serve hot and take note: All Filipino foods are always mixed with rice

text: Boil ½ kilo pork until soft  Cook the liver medium rare in a frying pan before boiling it together with the boiled pork.  Sauté the spices(Onion garlic, cherry tomato, laurel leaf)  Add the boiled pork, achuete extract and liver together with the sautéed spices, stir fry quickly just to combine and enhance the flavors.  Then you may now add the pork stock.  Add the tomato paste after the pork stock  Add the baby carrots last(The stock will taste disgusting when the carrots are over boiled, carrots are merely there for color)  Boil until the flavors have properly merge.  Serve hot and take note: All Filipino foods are always mixed with rice  Finished.
